Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.redhat.rhn.domain.channel.Channel.addPackage(Package)
    Do not use this method.
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.activationkey.ActivationKeyHandler.addPackageNames(User, String, List)
    being replaced by addPackages(string sessionKey, string key, array[packages])
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.system.SystemHandler.applyErrata(User, Integer, List)
    being replaced by system.scheduleApplyErrata(string sessionKey, int serverId, array[int errataId])
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.action.channel.manage.PublishErrataHelper.cloneErrataFast(Errata, Org)
    this function is deprecated by cloneErrataFaster
    com.redhat.rhn.manager.rhnset.RhnSetDecl.findOrCreate(String, SetCleanup)
    Do not use this method.
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.user.UserHandler.getLoggedInTime(User, String)
    Never returned usable value.
    com.redhat.rhn.domain.channel.Channel.getPackages()
    Do not use this method
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.software.ChannelSoftwareHandler.listAllPackages(User, String, String)
    being replaced by listAllPackages(string sessionKey, string channelLabel, dateTime.iso8601 startDate)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.software.ChannelSoftwareHandler.listAllPackages(User, String, String, String)
    being replaced by listAllPackages(string sessionKey, string channelLabel, dateTime.iso8601 startDate, dateTime.iso8601 endDate)
    com.redhat.rhn.manager.channel.ChannelManager.listAllPackagesByDate(Channel, String, String)
    The only thing to use this is ChannelSoftwareHandler.listAllPackagesByDate which is itself depricated
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.software.ChannelSoftwareHandler.listAllPackagesByDate(User, String)
    being replaced by listAllPackages(string sessionKey, string channelLabel)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.software.ChannelSoftwareHandler.listAllPackagesByDate(User, String, String)
    being replaced by listAllPackages(string sessionKey, string channelLabel, dateTime.iso8601 startDate)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.software.ChannelSoftwareHandler.listAllPackagesByDate(User, String, String, String)
    being replaced by listAllPackages(string sessionKey, string channelLabel, dateTime.iso8601 startDate, dateTime.iso8601 endDate)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.system.SystemHandler.listBaseChannels(User, Integer)
    being replaced by listSubscribableBaseChannels(string sessionKey, int serverId)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.errata.ErrataHandler.listByDate(User, String)
    being replaced by channel.software.listErrata(User LoggedInUser, string channelLabel)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.system.SystemHandler.listChildChannels(User, Integer)
    being replaced by listSubscribableChildChannels(string sessionKey, int serverId)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.software.ChannelSoftwareHandler.listErrata(User, String, String)
    being replaced by listErrata(string sessionKey, string channelLabel, dateTime.iso8601 startDate)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.software.ChannelSoftwareHandler.listErrata(User, String, String, String)
    being replaced by listErrata(string sessionKey, string channelLabel, dateTime.iso8601 startDate, dateTime.iso8601)
    com.redhat.rhn.manager.channel.ChannelManager.listErrataForDates(Channel, String, String)
    Use appropriate listErrata
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.kickstart.KickstartHandler.listKickstartableTrees(User, String)
    being replaced by kickstart.tree.list(string sessionKey, string channelLabel)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.ChannelHandler.listRedHatChannels(User)
    being replaced by listVendorChannels(String sessionKey)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.activationkey.ActivationKeyHandler.removePackageNames(User, String, List)
    being replaced by removePackages(string sessionKey, string key, array[packages])
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.system.SystemHandler.setBaseChannel(User, Integer, Integer)
    being replaced by system.setBaseChannel(string sessionKey, int serverId, string channelLabel)
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.software.ChannelSoftwareHandler.setSystemChannels(User, Integer, List)
    being replaced by system.setBaseChannel(string sessionKey, int serverId, string channelLabel) and system.setChildChannels(string sessionKey, int serverId, array[string channelLabel])
    com.redhat.rhn.frontend.xmlrpc.channel.software.ChannelSoftwareHandler.subscribeSystem(User, Integer, List)
    being replaced by system.setBaseChannel(string sessionKey, int serverId, string channelLabel) and system.setChildChannels(string sessionKey, int serverId, array[string channelLabel])
